thread.title: Nacogdoches’ Jones chosen as Under Armour All-American
thread.title_full: Nacogdoches’ Jones chosen as Under Armour All-American

author: MATT DEGROOD/The Nacogdoches Daily Sentinel
title: Nacogdoches’ Jones chosen as Under Armour All-American
text:
Brandon Jones Under Armour Victor Texcucano/The Daily Sentinel 
Nacogdoche senior safety Brandon Jones speaks in the Nacogdoches High School Competition Gym on Tuesday after he is presented with the jersey he will wear in the Under Armour All-America Bowl on Jan. 2, 2016, along with many other high school football standouts. Posted: Wednesday, October 14, 2015 12:30 am Nacogdoches’ Jones chosen as Under Armour All-American By MATT DEGROOD/The Nacogdoches Daily Sentinel The Lufkin News 
NACOGDOCHES — It’s always made sense to refer to Nacogdoches senior safety Brandon Jones as an All-American kid. kAm}@H :E’D @77:4:2=]k^Am kAmx? 7C@?E @7 72?D 2?5 72>:=J @? %F6D52J[ y@?6D H2D AC6D6?E65 H:E9 2 F?:7@C> E@ 2??@F?46 9:D A2CE:4:A2E:@? 2?5 D6=64E:@? :?
